QuestData.Title: The Fate of Karabor
QuestData.Description: Threads of the future weave together, winding and unwinding, creating tapestries that change in form and color from one moment to the next.$B$BI must have clarity. I must focus on the ONE strand that will become reality.$B$BWhen you are ready to share in my vision, drink the elixir.$B$BWhen the vision begins, be on your guard. The events of the vision are as deadly as anything we experience in this reality.
QuestData.LogDescription: Drink the Clarity Elixir and witness the fate of Karabor.
QuestData.CompletionText: <The Prophet is deep in thought. He looks troubled.>
QuestData.RewardText: I have seen enough. Ner'zhul must be stopped.
